name: The Lost Crystals of Drunkhard Invagast
name_original: The Lost Crystals of Drunkhard Invagast
description:
The drunken master Invagast has lost a sizeable stash of crystals.. In the wrong hands they may do a lot of damage. Help get them back into the hands of the responsible one. 

Made for 7-day #2 GDU game jam.
90% custom code. Graphics, sounds and music from following assets.

Sound:
- Medieval Fantasy Audio Bundle
Music:
- Epic Battle Music
GFX:
- Polygon Knights
- Low Poly ultimate Pack
- Toony Tiny RTS Set
- FANTSTIC - Nature Pack
- FANTASTIC - Village Pack
- Stylized Crystal Pack
